text:
@JoyAnnReid @MalcolmNance Are these governors going to be taking full responsibility for all deaths related to #COVID19 that occur after they lift their SIP order? 
Asking for the families that’ll soon be losing their loved ones. #DefendingTrumpIsAMentalDisorder

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
